posts.post_content:
I love this in suicide black. Which one of us can start over and deal 5 damage first? If I win, I go grab my win condition. If I lose? I still got to play ENTER THE DUNGEON! Also, I use a big boomy voice when I announce the card.  
  
I guess it should be noted, I like fun games more than I like winning.
